plugins.name: django-ticket-triage
plugins.description: Analyze a Django Trac ticket and produce a triage recommendation report.

plugins.name: html-visual
plugins.description: Generate an interactive single-file HTML visualization (mockup, wireframe, ERD, flowchart, chart, slides, architecture diagram, dashboard, timeline, mindmap, kanban, table).

plugins.name: obsidian-research
plugins.description: Obsidian fleeting note를 구조화된 리서치를 통해 permanent note로 발전시키는 제텔카스텐 워크플로우. init/gather/publish 서브커맨드로 단계별 리서치 수행.

plugins.name: ralph-loop-template
plugins.description: Generates iterable checklist PROMPT files for Ralph Loop from plan files or current context, and provides the /ralph-loop execution command.

plugins.name: write-pr
plugins.description: Analyzes git diff and commit history to write PR title and description based on the project's PR template.
